title: WTT: T206 Red Murray PSA 4 for A's Common (scans added)
author: Simmons Nation

posts.post_title: WTT: T206 Red Murray PSA 4 for A's Common (scans added)
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I have a Red Murray PSA 4 that I'd like to trade for one of the following at similar value.... I have them listed in order of my preference:

T205:
Bris Lord

T206:
Mike Powers
Simon Nichols (either pose)
Harry Krause (pitching)
Rube Oldring (batting)
Harry Davis (H. Davis)
Danny Murphy (horizontal)

If you don't have any of these, but want the Murray, I might be willing to take any Phillies common instead.

If you are interested, please email me at [url]brentpsujmc@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
Brent

scans added.
would also be willing to take any philadelphia T201 or T202 as well.
